Moeldoko Bakal Punya Wakil di KSP dari Kalangan Profesional
07 Nov 2019, 12:24 by Andhika Prasetia
Jakarta - Perpres mengenai Kantor Staf Presiden (KSP) sedang disusun. Kepala Staf Kepresidenan Moeldoko menyebut akan didampingi Wakil Kepala Staf.
"Perubahan itu terjadi pada, nanti ada wakil Kastaf. Yang kedua perubahan terjadi pada manusianya. Struktur bawahnya tetep, Deputi tetap ada 5, dan ada 3 staf khusus. ada perubahan, karena setelah kita bubarkan kemarin, kita hidupkan kembali sekarang," ujar Moeldoko di kompleks Istana Kepresidenan, Jakarta Pusat, Kamis (7/11/2019).
Selama ini Moeldoko tidak memiliki wakil dan langsung memiliki komando langsung ke deputi. Moeldoko mengatakan penambahan posisi wakil karena pertimbangan beban kerja.
"Mungkin ada pertimbangan beban kerja. nanti wakil staf lebih ke delivery unit, kastaf lebih ke policy-nya akan kita bagi seperti itu," ujar Moeldoko.
"(Wakil KSP dari kalangan) profesional," imbuh Moeldoko.
Tugas KSP akan diberi tambahan sebagai delivery unit. Moeldoko menambahkan, pihaknya mulai merekrut pegawai KSP.
"Sumbernya bisa kalangan profesional, bisa kalangan parpol, bisa kalangan relawan, ormas-ormas, NGO, dan berbagai sumber-sumber itu. untuk itu, kami membuka pintu siapa pun bisa mendaftar di sini. Dan kita sudah siapkan tim SDM-nya untuk seleksinya," ujar Moeldoko.

(dkp/fdn)

Moeldoko Will Have a Representative at KSP from Professionals
Nov 7 2019, 12:24 by Andhika Prasetia
Jakarta - Presidential Regulation on Presidential Staff Office (KSP) is being drafted. Presidential Chief of Staff Moeldoko said that he would be accompanied by Deputy Chief of Staff.
"The change occurred in, there will be representatives of Kastaf. The second change occurs in humans. The lower structure remains, there are still 5 deputies, and there are 3 special staff. There are changes, because after we disperse yesterday, we turn it back on now," said Moeldoko in the Presidential Palace complex, Central Jakarta, Thursday (11/07/2019).
So far Moeldoko has no representatives and has direct command to the deputies. Moeldoko said the addition of the position of representatives because of workload considerations.
"Maybe there are workload considerations. Later the staff representative will be more on the delivery unit, the staff will be more focused on the policy," Moeldoko said.
"(KSP representatives from among) professionals," Moeldoko added.
KSP tasks will be given additional as a delivery unit. Moeldoko added, his party began recruiting KSP employees.
"The source can be professionals, political parties, volunteers, mass organizations, NGOs, and various sources. For this reason, we open the door for anyone to register here. And we have prepared the HR team for selection. , "said Moeldoko.

(dkp / fdn)
